item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Orson Scott Card
item.description:
"My needs are simple and few, thought Valentine. Food. Clothing. A comfortable place to sleep. And <i>no idiots</i>.
But of course a world with no idiots would be lonely. If she herself were even allowed there." -- Orson Scott Card

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Vera Nazarian
item.description: "To every rule there is an exception—and an idiot ready to demonstrate it. Don't be the one!" -- Vera Nazarian

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "I get by with a little help from my friends." -- John Lennon

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by John Lennon
item.description:
"There's nothing you can do that can't be done Nothing you can sing that can't be sung. Nothing you can say but you can learn how to play the game. It's easy.
Nothing you can make that can't be made. No one you can save that can't be saved. Nothing you can do but you can learn how to be you in time. It's easy.
Nothing you can know that isn't known. Nothing you can see that isn't shown. Nowhere you can be that isn't where you're meant to be. It's easy." -- John Lennon

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Bashō
item.description: "April's air stirs in Willow-leaves...a butterfly Floats and balances" -- Bashō

item.title: Marguerite add a quote by Robert Burns
item.description: "There is no such uncertainty as a sure thing." -- Robert Burns
